name: Lavender
description: Lavender oil is extracted from the flowers of the lavender plant through steam distillation. It has a sweet, floral, and herbaceous aroma.

name: Peppermint
description: Peppermint oil is extracted from the leaves of the peppermint plant through steam distillation. It has a minty and refreshing aroma.

name: Tea Tree
description: Tea tree oil is extracted from the leaves of the tea tree plant through steam distillation. It has a medicinal and earthy aroma.

name: Eucalyptus
description: Eucalyptus oil is extracted from the leaves of the eucalyptus tree through steam distillation. It has a fresh and camphorous aroma.

name: Rosemary
description: Rosemary oil is extracted from the leaves of the rosemary plant through steam distillation. It has a woody and herbaceous aroma.

name: Lemon
description: Lemon oil is extracted from the peel of the lemon fruit through cold expression. It has a fresh and citrusy aroma.
